Verses: 1 en Magane, En Podhagaththai Maravaadhe; Un Irudhayam En Kattalaigalaik Kaakkakkadavadhu.
2 avaigal Unakku Neediththa Naatkalaiyum, Theerkkaayusaiyum, Samaadhaanaththaiyum Perugappannum.
3 kirubaiyum Saththiyamum Unnaivittu Vilagaadhiruppadhaaga; Nee Avaigalai Un Kazhuththile Poondu, Avaigalai Un Irudhayamaagiya Palagaiyil Ezhudhikkol.
4 adhinaal Dhevanudaiya Paarvaiyilum Manusharudaiya Paarvaiyilum Dhayaiyum Narbuththiyum Peruvaai.
5 un Suyabuththiyinmel Saayaamal, Un Muzhu Irudhayaththodum Karththaril Nambikkaiyaayirundhu,
6 un Vazhigalilellaam Avarai Ninaiththukkol; Appozhudhu Avar Un Paadhaigalai Sevvaippaduththuvaar.
7 nee Unnai Gnaaniyendru Ennaadhe; Karththarukku Bayandhu, Theemaiyai Vittu Vilagu.
8 adhu Un Naabikku Aarokkiyamum, Un Elumbugalukku Oonumaagum.
9 un Porulaalum, Un Ellaa Vilaivin Mudharpalanaalum Karththarai Ganampannu.
10 appozhudhu Un Kalanjiyangal Pooranamaai Nirambum; Un Aalaigalil Thraatcharasam Purandodum.
11 en Magane, Nee Karththarudaiya Sitchaiyai Arpamaaga Ennaadhe, Avar Kadindhukollumbodhu Sorndhupogaadhe.
12 thagappan Thaan Nesikkira Puththiranai Sitchikkiradhupola, Karththarum Evanidaththil Anbukoorugiraaro Avanai Sitchikkiraar.
13 gnaanaththaik Kandadaigira Manushanum, Buththiyai Sambaadhikkira Manushanum Baakkiyavaangal.
14 adhin Varththagam Velli Varththagaththilum, Adhin Aadhaayam Pasumponnilum Uththamamaanadhu.
15 muththukkalaippaarkilum Adhu Vilaiyerappetradhu; Nee Ichchikkaththakkadhondrum Adharku Nigaralla.
16 adhin Valadhu Kaiyil Theerkkaayusum, Adhin Idadhukaiyil Selvamum Ganamum Irukkiradhu.
17 adhin Vazhigal Inidhaana Vazhigal, Adhin Paadhaigalellaam Samaadhaanam.
18 adhu Thannai Adaindhavargalukku Jeevavirutcham, Adhaip Patrikkollugira Evanum Baakkiyavaan.
19 karththar Gnaanaththinaale Boomiyai Asthibaarappaduththi, Buththiyinaale Vaanangalai Sthaabiththaar.
20 avarudaiya Gnaanaththinaale Aazhangal Pirindhadhu, Aagaayamum Paniyaippeygiradhu.
21 en Magane, Ivaigal Un Kangalai Vittup Piriyaadhiruppadhaaga; Meygngnaanaththaiyum Nallaalosanaiyaiyum Kaaththukkol.
22 avaigal Un Aaththumaavukku Jeevanum, Un Kazhuththukku Alangaaramumaayirukkum.
23 appozhudhu Nee Bayamindri Un Vazhiyil Nadappaai, Un Kaal Idaraadhu.
24 nee Padukkumbodhu Bayappadaadhiruppaai; Nee Paduththukkollumbodhu Un Niththirai Inbamaayirukkum.
25 sadidhiyaana Thigilum, Dhushtargalin Paazhkkadippum Varumbodhu Nee Anjavendaam.
26 karththar Un Nambikkaiyaayirundhu, Un Kaal Sikkikkollaadhapadi Kaappaar.
27 nanmaiseyyumpadi Unakkuth Thraaniyirukkumbodhu, Adhai Seyyaththakkavargalukku Seyyaamal Iraadhe.
28 unnidaththil Porul Irukkaiyil Un Ayalaanai Nokki: Nee Poith Thirumbavaa, Naalaikkuth Tharuven Endru Sollaadhe.
29 achchamindri Unnidaththil Vaasampannugira Un Ayalaanukku Virodhamaaga Theengu Ninaiyaadhe.
30 oruvan Unakkuth Theenguseyyaadhirukka, Kaaranamindri Avanode Vazhakkaadaadhe.
31 kodumaiyullavanmel Poraamai Kollaadhe; Avanudaiya Vazhigalilondraiyum Therindhukollaadhe.
32 maarupaadullavan Karththarukku Aruvaruppaanavan; Needhimaangalode Avarudaiya Ragasiyam Irukkiradhu.
33 dhunmaarkkanudaiya Veettil Karththarin Saabam Irukkiradhu, Needhimaangaludaiya Vaasasthalaththaiyo Avar Aaseervadhikkiraar.
34 igazhvorai Avar Igazhugiraar; Thaazhmaiyullavargalukko Kirubaiyalikkiraar.
35 gnaanavaangal Ganaththai Sudhandharippaargal; Madhikedaro Ganaveenaththai Adaivaargal.
